quote: If you still don't like it, that's OK: that's why I'm boss. I simply know better than you do.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Those that can, do. Those that can't, complain.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Theory and practice sometimes clash. And when that happens, theory loses. Every single time.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: If no mistake have you made, yet losing you are ... a different game you should play.
author: Master Yoda

quote: No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.
author: Master Yoda

quote: You must unlearn what you have learned.
author: Master Yoda

quote: You think Yoda stops teaching, just because his student does not want to hear? A teacher Yoda is. Yoda teaches like drunkards drink, like killers kill.
author: Master Yoda

quote: Honor is a fool's prize. Glory is of no use to the dead.
author: Darth Bane (quoting Darth Revan)

quote: Everybody lies.
author: Gregory House

quote: We all make mistakes, and we all pay a price.
author: Gregory House

quote: Occam's Razor.  The simplest explanation is almost always somebody screwed up.
author: Gregory House

quote: Never trust a computer you canâ€™t throw out a window.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Grown men do not need leaders.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Anarchism is founded on the observation that since few men are wise enough to rule themselves, even fewer are wise enough to rule others.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: An approximate answer to the right problem is worth a good deal more than an exact answer to an approximate problem.
author: John Tukey

quote: As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain, as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Absolute certainty is a privilege of uneducated minds-and fanatics. It is, for scientific folk, an unattainable ideal.
author: Cassius J. Keyser

quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Everyone has a fair turn to be as great as he pleases.
author: Jeremy Collier

quote: If nobody hates you, you're doing something wrong.
author: Gregory House

quote: When they're about to hang you, ask for a glass of water. You never know what might happen before they bring it.
author: Vesemir
